Description:
" Toki Tori 2 "- A sequel to the award-winning play, which originated studio Two Tribes ten years ago. 
Here you will experience a totally different feel of the game, which is created for the technologies and
players of today. Yellow chicken Toki Tori does not look like a fearless hero. And, even though he
was the central character of the game, alone it can not cope with the upcoming mission. Encountering
strange creatures, he can whistle and whisper woo them and use their abilities.
